From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::WindRider::
WindRider had been flying for several miles and had
seen nothing. Suddenly, he saw a ship ahead in the
distance. He examined it further, and saw that it was
the Cybertronian Fire.He recognized it because he had
been at the spaceport the day it launched. He also
knew that he had traveled through a rift in time, and
was now in the middle of a war. This was not good. He
was a peace loving bot, and had no use for war. Still,
he decided that it would be safer for him there than
out here in the open. He opened his comm, and
transmitted a message. "Cybertronian Fire, do you read
me. My name is WindRider. I am a Maximal, and I am
stranded on this planet.Im not far from your position.
Request permission to come in. Please respond."
